title: Drabble List?
body:

summary:
To Bangtan :
Before the others you were all mine.
Mine in the places I walk to, in the stores I bought stickers and the crinkly...
body:
To Bangtan :

Before the others you were all mine.

Mine in the places I walk to, in the stores I bought stickers and the crinkly scarf I had last December. I kept wondering about that one night, you whispered your hello to the empty sky.

Before the others, I had you.

Mine on the narrow road, mine when the laughter in my chest wobbled in tiny spaces. Your smile bloomed in mind during the days I only had myself to hold on to. There were a lot of things I wanted to tell you.

Before the others, you sang to me first.

Mine in the folders, you were laying in all of my spaces. I had your names in every corner, my lips calling you out whenever it gets too loud.

title: dirty talk - [Jung Hoseok]
body:
“Jiminnn! My sweet angel!!”
You yelled throwing yourself on your friend hugging him tight. The blond haired man hugged you back tightly, nuzzling his nose in your hair. You giggled, face in the crook of his neck, inhaling his sweet sent. His neck was so soft and he smelled so good, you thought. 

You made your way in between his legs, head laying on his chest. You proceeded to watch whatever was playing on the television while giving his small hands a massage. You two stayed like that for a couple of minutes until your heard your sweet angel’s voice : 
“Ahhhh Hoseok is such a lucky guy to have you~. “
He murmured with a smirk, knowing this would emit a reaction from you. You choked on air before turning around, facing him, cheeks ruby colored. You yelled and started fake punching him in the chest. This sweet bean, aka Jimin, started laughing uncontrollably, hands wrapped around your waist. He then had the mischievous idea to start tickling you. 
“ A-Ah STOP this is illegal!!“

After around 30 seconds or so, the door flew open revealing Namjoon in his pj pants and white shirt clinging to his form.

“ whats all this fuss about ? “
He said while yawning. Oops? forgot to mention that it was super early, like 9am? Okay so what happened was that you couldn’t sleep anymore, sooooo you just got up to see if someone was (hopefully) up as well. You ended up finding Jimin in the living room of the studio, in his cute pj, sipping on water and being the cutiepie he is. 

Okay back to where we were. 

” it’s him!! Save me Jooniiie “ 

You yelled between laughter, trying to escape Jimin’s grasp. The (smol) man was basically on top of you straddling your hips. His hands were tickling you around your waist as you were running out of breath. RM only sighed, running a hand through his hair smirking looking at you two. 

Instead of helping you ( thx namjoon ), he opened the door and yelled

You blushed at the mention of the name he used, momentarily forgetting that Jimin was tickling you with no mercy. On the other hand, when Jimin realized what RM shouted, he instantly got up and ran to the door locking it. The second he managed to lock it, he heard pounding on the other side. 

” You won’t get her Hoseok she’s mine now!“ Yelled Jimin between laughs, hands around his belly hurting from laughing too much. 

” Jimin let my 공주 (princess) gooooooo! “ Yelled Hoseok from the other side of the door still pounding on it.

You just sat there, basking in the in the sun coming from the large windows, a smile plastered on your face. You couldn’t have asked for nothing more in your entire life. You loved all the boys, and you loved life. You were thankful every single day for them. 

Namjoon ( yes he was still stuck in the middle of that ) eyed you, thinking about if he should join this your crazy shenanigans or not. It was still pretty early and he had just woke up. He decided to go settle down on the couch, sitting right next to you.

“ Hey! I want that massage too Y/N! “

You laughed at their childish behaviors, gesturing for Jimin to open the door so you could finally see your precious Hobi.

The door opened revealing a (smol) Hoseok sitting on the ground, legs crossed. His squished cheek was resting on his palm. He had been waiting for 10 minutes for Jimin to open the door, wanting to see you.

As soon as you two made eye contact, you started to run toward him, jumping in his laps. Your arms flew around his neck, hugging him tightly, making him almost fall back on the ground, leaning on his hands for support.

summary: Lately I dont know where to go, where to stand in the spaces of my room. The voices from the television speaks for me when it...
body: Lately I dont know where to go, where to stand in the spaces of my room. The voices from the television speaks for me when it gets too lonely. I want you to know that I’m alright. That some days I want to run away but the skies peeked through heavy hills whispering about happy days. I’m so grateful that you’re alive.
